pages.text: $(d)Lotus Blossoms$() can be eaten to give the player a handful of experience.$(br2)If you eat them while sneaking, you'll consume the entire stack at once.
pages.title: Lotus Blossom

pages.text: Lotus Blossoms can be farmed with $(d)Lotus Seeds$(), which are planted on any dirt/grass blocks.$(br2)You can find naturally occurring Lotus plants in $(3)cold biomes$().
pages.title: Lotus Seeds
